Comment: I've spent most of my life around people like this.  A very, very large portion of conservative beliefs in the US completely rely on you not knowing how things are done in other countries. It's an extremely fragile house of cards that can literally be blown away in seconds, which is why there is so much fear of education/fear of others/promotion of anti-intellectualism in those circles. I lost count of the times I got yelled out of a room/group because I told people they were lied to about the most basic, common-sense things; no, "America" is not the biggest country in the world, nor is it the only place where people have roads and live in houses with electricity instead of huts or trees.  And maybe if they took \*one minute\* to do a simple google search, they would also learn that the whole litter box thing was completely false.
